attributes.action: Ban the use of Depleted Uranium in weapons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
DU weaponry violates all international treaties and agreements, Hague and Geneva war conventions.

It is a heavy metal poison, a radioactive poison and also has a particulate effect.

There is no way to clean it up and it remains dangerously radio active for billions of years.

 It causes hideous birth defects in the afflicted families such as being born with peeling, cracking, bleeding skin, swollen limbs, missing limbs, giant heads and tumors, missing brains, cyclops and missing eyes and a multitude of other "defects."
This is a truly nightmarish curse, destroying hope by most cruelly attacking those yet to be born.

Ban it. Ban it now and prosecute policy makers responsible for it's use for crimes aganist humanity.
